title: so you sure that karthus in arurf is ok?

replies.body:
If  you have 1 or 2 other big threats karthus either will kill you or force your hourglass(you have you pay ur karthus tax) and they catch you out. 
I've won 3 karthus matches and lost 1 due to the enemy having mao, and gnar.
How does that happen? Do you have a replay? I know his Q got cast-buffering a while back, but I hadn't heard of it making him actually good in URF.
*presses r, enemy team realizes they haven't gotten their zhonyas yet, and those who have already used it.*

> [{quoted}](name=CaptainM16,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=trX9EYxU,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-01T05:22:35.292+0000)
>
> https://imgur.com/DMOGQfI

In this one, three people were low health. That's Karthus time. And then Amumu comes in, tries to use his ult to interrupt a channel when all it does is root and disarm, and doesn't use his Q to interrupt the channel (the initial hit stuns, and the CD starts at 3.2sec in URF and goes down to 1.6sec at rank 5), then stands there trying to outduel Karthus Q spam, which, even outside of URF, is an unwise decision.

> [{quoted}](name=CaptainM16,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=trX9EYxU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-02-01T05:21:41.678+0000)
>
> https://imgur.com/kYRdUuT

Ah, they all grouped up, walked into his wall, and stood there while he spammed Q. Yeah, gonna have a bad time. Even outside of URF, that's an unwise decision.
